entries.title: After two years of great times and rewarding collaborations in Copenhagen, I’ll be moving on to the next exciting chapter of my life and career in NYC. I am looking for creative opportunities as front-end developer of meaningful, content-focussed and human-centred digital products. If you’d hear of any interesting opportunities or would like to talk about a potential collaboration, [please get in touch](mailto:hello@sylvainreucherand.fr)!

paragraphs: The H4 concept is anchored in the simplicity and purity of the product design and a stripped back to essentials look with a high level of confidence. Almost naked with simple product images and pared-back descriptions. Less is really more. Unfiltered is the key message.

entries.title: Moved from Paris to Copenhagen and joined the e-Types digital team for 3 months.
Graduated from interactive design at Gobelins — l'école de l'image, Paris.

paragraphs: Mirage is an interactive short movie about transhumanism and the place that human gives to the technology in his life. It was my graduation project at Gobelins, l’École de l’Image, Paris — France.
